COMMAND.NAME: yesnodialog
COMMAND.PARAMETER: dialogText Specifies a message requesting information from the user.
COMMAND.SUMMARY: Open a dialog with Yes, No, and Cancel
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Open a dialog with Yes, No, and Cancel buttons, containing dialogText.
COMMAND.OUTPUT: If the user exits the dialog with Yes, yesnodialog will return 1. If the user exits the dialog with No, yesnodialog will return 0.
COMMAND.STATUS: If the user exits the dialog with Cancel yesnodialog will return an error.
